item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，微软停止在美国咨询部门招聘员工，以削减成本
item.description: 据 CNBC 周二援引一份内部备忘录报道，微软正计划停止在美国的部分咨询业务招聘，以削减成本。【原文：Microsoft is planning to halt hiring in part of its consulting business in the U.S. in a bid to cut costs, CNBC reported on Tuesday, citing an internal memo.】

item.title: 生物制药行业期待 2025 年反弹，努力应对特朗普回归的不确定性
item.description: 生物制药行业的目标是在 2025 年扭转去年投资者回报率下滑的局面，但对当选总统唐纳德-特朗普在药品定价改革和疫苗等热点问题上的优先考虑事项仍心存疑虑。【原文：The biopharmaceutical industry is aiming for a 2025 reversal of last year's slump in investor returns but remains wary over what President-elect Donald Trump's priorities might be on hot button issues such as drug pricing reforms and vaccines.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，贝莱德高管马克-威德曼将离开公司
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周二援引四位与贝莱德关系密切的人士的话报道称，资产管理公司贝莱德（BlackRock）的高管马克-维德曼（Mark Wiedman）即将离职，他曾被视为首席执行官拉里-芬克（Larry Fink）的潜在接班人。【原文：Asset manager BlackRock's top executive Mark Wiedman, who was touted to be a potential successor to CEO Larry Fink, is departing the firm, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday, citing four people close to the company.】

item.title: 美国航空业游说团体负责人年底退休
item.description: 曾帮助美国航空公司赢得 540 亿美元联邦 COVID 减免基金的美国航空公司贸易组织（Airlines for America）的长期负责人将于今年年底退休。【原文：The long-time head of the trade group Airlines for America who helped U.S. airlines win $54 billion in federal COVID relief funds will retire at the end of the year.】

item.title: 殖民地公司因汽油可能泄漏而关闭输油管道
item.description: 美国最大的成品油管道运营商殖民管道公司（Colonial Pipeline）周二表示，该公司正在对佐治亚州保定县可能发生汽油泄漏的报告作出反应，其一条主干线已暂时关闭。【原文：Colonial Pipeline, the largest refined products pipeline operator in the United States, said on Tuesday it was responding to a report of a potential gasoline leak in Paulding County, Georgia and that one of its mainlines was temporarily shut down.】

item.title: 阿根廷 12 月通胀率升至 2.7%，2024 年底通胀率为 118
item.description: 周二的数据显示，阿根廷12月份的月通胀率略有上升，尽管在自由主义总统哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）推行严厉的紧缩措施和削减开支的情况下，年通胀率继续放缓。【原文：Argentine monthly inflation ticked up slightly in December, data showed on Tuesday, though the annual rate continued to slow amid tough austerity measures and spending cuts being pushed by libertarian President Javier Milei.】

item.title: 苹果和亚马逊因涉嫌 "合谋 "而在英国打赢 6 亿美元官司
item.description: 英国一家法庭周二裁定，苹果公司和亚马逊公司成功地击退了英国的一场大规模诉讼，这场诉讼指控这两家科技巨头串通一气，将苹果新产品的经销商从亚马逊网站上删除。【原文：Apple and Amazon have successfully fought off a mass lawsuit in Britain over alleged collusion between the tech giants to remove resellers of new Apple products from Amazon's website, a tribunal ruled on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国 2025 财年前三个月出现创纪录的 7110 亿美元赤字
item.description: 美国财政部周二表示，美国政府在 12 月份出现了 870 亿美元的预算赤字，部分原因是将福利金支付转移到了 11 月份，但 2025 财年前三个月的赤字达到了创纪录的 7110 亿美元。【原文：The U.S. government posted an $87 billion budget deficit in December, reduced partly by a shift of benefit payments into November but capping a record $711 billion deficit for the first three months of the 2025 fiscal year, the U.S. Treasury Department said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 联合国航运负责人表示，无管制油轮船队带来的风险正在上升
item.description: 联合国航运机构负责人周二表示，不受监管的油轮带来的安全风险正在上升，所谓的 "影子船队 "对海洋环境和海员都构成了威胁。【原文：The safety risks posed by unregulated oil tankers are rising, and the so-called shadow fleet is a threat to both the maritime environment and seafarers, the head of the United Nations' shipping agency said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 超过 50 万 "TikTok 难民 "涌入中国的红笔记网站
item.description: 消息人士告诉路透社，就在美国提议禁止流行社交媒体应用 TikTok 的前几天，中国社交媒体应用红笔记的新用户蜂拥而至，这家知名度不高的公司正急于利用突然涌入的用户，同时又要小心谨慎地审核英文内容。【原文：New users have piled in to Chinese social media app RedNote just days before a proposed U.S. ban on the popular social media app TikTok, as the lesser-known company rushes to capitalize on the sudden influx while walking a delicate line of moderating English-language content, sources told Reuters.】

item.title: Meta 将裁员 5% 的 "表现最差者"，并计划为受影响的职位招聘人员
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司发言人周二表示，该公司将裁减约 5%的 "业绩最差者"，并计划在今年招聘受影响的职位。【原文：Meta Platforms will trim about 5% of its "lowest performers" and plans to hire for the impacted roles this year, a company spokesperson said on Tuesday.】

item.title: OpenAI 推出类似助手的功能 "任务"，以对抗 Alexa 和 Siri
item.description: 生成式人工智能风向标 OpenAI 周二表示，它将向 ChatGPT 推出一项名为 "任务"（Tasks）的测试版功能，这标志着该公司将进军虚拟助手领域，与苹果的 Siri 和亚马逊的 Alexa 展开竞争。【原文：Generative artificial intelligence bellwether OpenAI said on Tuesday that it is introducing a beta feature called Tasks to ChatGPT, signaling the company's foray into the virtual assistant space, competing with Apple's Siri and Amazon's Alexa.】

item.title: EIA 上调 2025 年美国石油产量预期，下调 2024 年预期
item.description: 美国能源信息署（U.S. Energy Information Administration）周二在其《短期能源展望》（Short-Term Energy Outlook）报告中称，美国今年的石油产量有望创下比此前预计更大的纪录。【原文：U.S. oil production is poised to set a larger record this year than prior estimates, the U.S. Energy Information Administration said on Tuesday in its Short-Term Energy Outlook report.】

item.title: 加沙停火协议有望提振该地区政府债券市场
item.description: 周二，投资者在经历了 15 个月的冲突后感到如释重负，达成停火协议以结束加沙战争的希望提振了该地区的政府债券市场和以色列的谢克尔。【原文：Hopes of a ceasefire deal to end the war in Gaza lifted the region's government bond markets and Israel's shekel on Tuesday as investors sensed relief after 15 months of conflict.】

item.title: 私募股权投资人阿德巴约-奥贡莱西加入 OpenAI 董事会
item.description: 聊天软件制造商 OpenAI 周二表示，私募股权投资界资深人士 Adebayo Ogunlesi（现任全球基础设施合作伙伴公司（GIP）首席执行官）已加入该公司董事会。【原文：ChatGPT maker OpenAI said on Tuesday private equity veteran Adebayo Ogunlesi, who is currently the CEO of Global Infrastructure Partners (GIP), has joined its board.】

item.title: 美国起诉 KKR 涉嫌逃避反垄断审查
item.description: 美国司法部周二表示，已对 KKR & Co Inc 提起民事诉讼，指控该公司在 2021 年至 2022 年期间 "多次藐视并购前反垄断审查程序"，"至少在 16 项独立交易中规避了反垄断审查"。【原文：The U.S. Department of Justice on Tuesday said it had filed a civil lawsuit against KKR & Co Inc "for repeatedly flouting the premerger antitrust review process," alleging that the company had "evaded antitrust scrutiny for at least 16 separate transactions" from 2021 to 2022.】

item.title: 账簿管理人称，辉瑞打算将其在舒肤佳生产商 Haleon 的持股比例降至 7.3
item.description: 一位账簿管理人周二表示，辉瑞打算出售约 7 亿股 Haleon 普通股，将其在这家英国消费者保健集团的持股比例降至约 7.3%。【原文：Pfizer intends to sell about 700 million ordinary shares in Haleon , cutting its stake to about 7.3% in the British consumer healthcare group, a bookrunner said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 波音飞机 2024 年交付量降至大流行病以来最低点
item.description: 去年秋天，一场严重的罢工导致生产放缓，此后波音公司新喷气式飞机的交付量在 12 月份出现反弹，但该公司 2024 年的年交付量却降至 COVID-19 大流行以来的最低水平。【原文：Deliveries of new Boeing jets bounced back in December after a crippling labor strike that slowed production last fall, but the company's annual deliveries dropped in 2024 to the lowest level since the COVID-19 pandemic.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会发现主要药房福利管理公司哄抬药价，从中获利 73 亿美元
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会周二表示，美国三大药房福利管理公司在其下属药房大幅提高了某些药品的价格，包括治疗心脏病、癌症和艾滋病的药品。【原文：The nation's three largest pharmacy benefit managers have significantly marked up the prices of certain medicines, including for heart disease, cancer and HIV, at their affiliated pharmacies, the U.S. Federal Trade Commission said on Tuesday.】

item.title: LVMH集团称 "不可能 "控制香槟运往俄罗斯后的最终销售点
item.description: LVMH 集团周二表示，"不可能 "控制第三方分销商销售的产品的最终目的地，因为有报道称，该法国奢侈品集团的香槟在停止俄罗斯业务后仍被运到了那里。【原文：LVMH said on Tuesday it was "impossible" to control the final destination of products sold by third-party distributors after a report said the French luxury group's champagne reached Russia even after it halted business there.】

item.title: 波音公司高管认为十年末将实现供需平衡
item.description: 波音公司一位高管周一表示，预计到本世纪末，客机的供应和市场需求将达到平衡。【原文：Boeing expects to reach a balance between supply and market demand for passenger jets by the end of the decade, an executive said on Monday.】

item.title: 俄罗斯北极石油感受到美国制裁的寒意
item.description: 据三位熟悉俄罗斯北极地区石油物流的消息人士称，俄罗斯庞大的北极地区石油业务正面临着美国对其油轮和油库实施制裁所带来的重大干扰，此前被亚洲买家抢购的原油供应被滞留在仓库中。【原文：Russia's vast Arctic oil business is facing major disruption from U.S. sanctions on its tankers and depots, stranding crude supplies previously snapped up by Asian buyers in storage, according to three sources familiar with its logistics.】

item.title: 债券抛售减弱，欧美股市上涨，通胀成为关注焦点
item.description: 尽管在周三的美国消费者价格通胀数据和唐纳德-特朗普下周的总统就职典礼之前，投资者仍持谨慎态度，但由于债券抛售有所缓和，美国和欧洲股市周二走高。【原文：U.S. and European stocks ticked higher on Tuesday as a sell-off in bonds moderated, although investors remained cautious ahead of U.S. consumer price inflation data on Wednesday and Donald Trump's inauguration as president next week.】

item.title: 佳洁士和高露洁针对儿童牙膏和漱口水中的氟提起诉讼
item.description: 宝洁公司（Procter & Gamble）和高露洁-棕榄公司（Colgate-Palmolive）是六起新诉讼案的被告之一，这些诉讼案针对的是幼儿牙膏和漱口水的销售，因为这些产品含有氟化物，吞咽后可能有害。【原文：Procter & Gamble and Colgate-Palmolive are among the defendants in six new lawsuits targeting the sale of toothpaste and mouth rinse for young children because the products contain fluoride, which can be harmful if swallowed.】

item.title: 礼来预计第四季度减肥药销售疲软
item.description: 礼来公司预计，第四季度流行的减肥药Zepbound和相关糖尿病治疗药物Mounjaro的销售额将低于华尔街预期，但预计2025年的收入将基本高于预期。【原文：Eli Lilly expects sales of popular weight-loss drug Zepbound and related diabetes treatment Mounjaro to miss Wall Street expectations in the fourth quarter, but forecast 2025 revenue largely above estimates.】

item.title: 中国将参与台湾军售的七家美国公司列入黑名单
item.description: 中国商务部周二表示，它已将七家美国公司列入所谓的 "不可靠实体名单"，因为这些公司参与了对台军售，而中国视台湾为其领土的一部分。【原文：The Chinese commerce ministry said on Tuesday that it had added seven U.S. companies to its so-called "Unreliable Entity List" for their involvement in arms sales to Taiwan, which China regards as part of its territory.】

item.title: 美国因维吾尔族强迫劳动禁止更多公司进口产品
item.description: 美国联邦政府周二发布公告称，因涉嫌侵犯中国维吾尔族人权，美国已禁止进口另一批公司的产品，目标是30多家纺织、采矿和太阳能企业。【原文：The United States has banned imports from another tranche of companies over alleged human rights abuses involving the Uyghurs in China, targeting more than 30 textile, mining and solar entities, a federal government notice published on Tuesday said.】

item.title: 美国 12 月生产者价格温和上涨
item.description: 美国生产者价格在 12 月份温和上涨，但这不太可能改变人们的看法，即在劳动力市场保持韧性的情况下，美联储不会在今年下半年之前再次降息。【原文：U.S. producer prices increased moderately in December, but that is unlikely to change views that the Federal Reserve would not cut interest rates again before the second half of this year amid labor market resilience.】

item.title: 摩根大通任命首席执行官竞争者詹妮弗-皮普扎克（Jennifer Piepszak）为运营总监
item.description: 摩根大通周二晋升内部人士詹妮弗-皮普扎克（Jennifer Piepszak）为首席运营官，接替将于 2026 年底退休的丹尼尔-平托（Daniel Pinto），后者被视为首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）职位的有力竞争者。【原文：JPMorgan Chase on Tuesday promoted insider Jennifer Piepszak, seen as a strong contender for CEO Jamie Dimon's role, as its chief operating officer in place of Daniel Pinto, who will retire at the end of 2026.】

item.title: 世界杯临近，美国银行与美国足协合作
item.description: 美国银行将成为美国所有 27 支国家足球队的官方银行合作伙伴，此前这家华尔街巨头和美国足协于本周二宣布了他们的合作关系。【原文：Bank of America is set to become the official banking partner of all 27 national soccer teams in the United States, after the Wall Street behemoth and the U.S. Soccer Federation announced their partnership on Tuesday.】
